ingredients.ingredient: 1 (12 ounce) package crescent roll dough (such as Pillsbury® Grands!™)
1 (8 ounce) ham steak, cut into 1/2-inch pieces

cookingTips: Don't overstuff croissants or filling will leak during baking
Use refrigerated crescent dough for easiest handling and best results
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Quick breakfast using pre-made dough. Comfortable with simple stuffed pastries?
